protocol.name: P-MEXP-5346
protocol.text: Total RNA was amplified and Biotin labeled using the Affymetrix Enzo Kit method Described in Affymetrix GeneChip Technical Analysis Manual

protocol.name: P-MEXP-5353
protocol.text: plants was grown in a chamber with 16hr light (21C) and 8hr dark (16C).

protocol.name: P-MEXP-5354
protocol.text: Plant were treated as equaly as possible

protocol.name: P-MEXP-5373
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated from leaves of 3 weaks old plants, using the  TRIzol protocol (invitrogen).

protocol.name: P-MEXP-5390
text: Transformations: Gene expression intensities was normalized using R implementation of qspline (Workman et al., 2002; Gautier et al., 2004). An implementation in the statistical language R of the logit-t method (Lemon et al., 2003) applying two-way ANOVA was used to calculate statistical significance for differentially gene expression. Gene expression index values were calculated using the PM only R implementation of the Li and Wong (2001) method (Gautier et al., 2004). # Refs# # Workman C, Jensen LJ, Jarmer H, Berka R, Gautier L, Nielsen HB, Saxild HH, Nielsen C, Brunak S, Knudsen S. A new non-linear normalization method for reducing variability in DNA microarray experiments. Genome Biol. 2002 Aug 30;3(9):research0048.  # Gautier L, Cope L, Bolstad BM, Irizarry RA. (2004) affy--analysis of Affymetrix GeneChip data at the probe level. Bioinformatics, 20, 307-15.  Lemon WJ, Liyanarachchi S, You M, A high performance test of differential gene expression for oligonucleotide arrays. Genome Biology 2003, 4:R67 # Li C and Wong WH. (2001) Model-based analysis of oligonucleotide arrays: model validation, design issues and standard error application Genome biology,
